tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Great doc. Sorted out my issue within 20 minutes. I'm happy with the result, and would recommend the team to anyone requiring dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Bandish Parekh is professional and friendly. I went to his Matunga Clinic regarding cavity and pain problem in my tooth (including RCT as told to me by 2 other Dentists earlier who were overcharging me for RCT and tooth filling). I found him over Practo only. He explained everything in detail to me before beginning with the treatment and, trust my words, it was painless and he knew exactly what he was doing, on top of that he saved my tooth as he explained my tooth didn't needed the RCT which overall saved me money, tooth and time as well. He is someone I would recommended everyone to visit if having any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My family and I have been visiting since the past 10years and we have had a wonderful experience with him as our dentist. He has taken the utmost care with each of us and has instilled great confidence in us over the years with his very kind approach to something as gruelling and nightmarish as dental checkups. His systematic and methodical nature as well as high regard for hygiene must be applauded. It must be noted that he also ensures all measures to make sure that the patient on his chair is comfortable at all times whether it is with the actual procedures ongoing or the ambience of the room which is always jolly. We recommend him a 100% for any dental issues.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind words. So nice of you to write such a wonderful review. Inspires me to serve and work better.
After all, you both are my favorite people.  :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Bandish Parekh is professional & quite friendly... His clinic is well equipped... Me and my family have been trusting him fully with our dental care... Procedures are well explained and treatment is top-notch... He is operating with all necessary precautions and provided us with his services even in the ongoing pandemic...  As soon as you reach his Clinic, there is foot pedal operated sanitizer outside & then provided with disposable shoe covers, headcovers & gloves... Also, the temperature check is done... He & his entire staff follow the required social distancing and wear a medical safety kit... Patients can expect treatment under a safe clinical practice...

review: I've always had a good experience with doctor Parekh. He takes the time to explain his observations and next steps, and will answer any questions you have. He also manages to make most of his treatment painless, and will warn you if you're about to face any pain. Overall, I'll recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: dr. bandish gave me the most painless treatment. i don’t trust so easily but he made sure i was given the most comfortable and painless treatment. also, he was so kind to me and quick with his work. truly one of the best doctors. 100% worth it. highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Had a great experience with Dr Bandish - he does the most complex procedures with ease. I had multiple tooth extractions, 1 root canal and multiple filings. He patiently explained the situation and scheduled the procedures in the most optimal manner - also managed to save 1 tooth from root canal and did filing. His attitude is great which allows him to put the patient at ease. I was very nervous and asked a lot of questions but he patiently handled all of them with a smile. Highly recommended.
reply_text:
Thanks Ashish for the wonderful feedback. 
And it was a pleasure :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctors and staff here are amazing! They always get me in the same day if I have a tooth emergency. I have sensitive tooth and everytime I come in they always are sensitive to my concern and adress them. I will keep coming here for many years to come!!♥️

tags: Value for money,
review:
Very able and has immense patience to listen and then come up with an explanation of why the problem and then the treatment.
His recommendations are spot on because he uses a language easily understood by us common folk.
Such a young age lends an affability to all age group

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Bandish and his team are very professional and punctual.
My 3 visits have all had the same experience.
Dr.Bandish is very friendly and explains the issues very clearly. Also gives all information on solutions before going ahead with any procedure.
This clinic is very clean and has good ambience.
It is safe for me to say i don't fear visiting a dentist anymore.

Thank you for excellent treatment and quality of service.

review: I had been to Dr. Parekh for my kid's dental check up but due to this CoVid-19 situation he took a decision to not treat my kid by himself as a safety precaution and referred me to a pediatric specialist dentist and he even did not charge us a penny as my kid was not getting treated under him. My overall experience was just fabulous and I would strongly recommend this doc for any adult dental treatment. Thank you Dr. Parekh.
